JUST ARRIVED!!! -   The 2012 Peugeot 308 1.6 THP CC and this is what it has to offer.
New lines, better body contours, technological elegance, illustrated by the presence of LED front lights with light guide.  Xenon headlamps, stop ansd start, power steering and air bags. The interior offers much more space and is so comfortable.Special feautures consist of a high quality audio and telematics system, Bluetooth hands-free kit, WIP Nav satellite navigation and WIP Com 3D with a retractable 7" 16/9 colour display. Call us today for more information. Full Dekra condition and roadworthy report. Price does not include smash and grab and dealership fees.
